description: Format used to define new artifacts in VCMI
title: VCMI artifact format

___slot.description: Slot to which this artifact can be put, if applicable

___event.description: Text that visible on picking this artifact on map

___index.description: Private field to break things, do not use.

___type.description: Type of this artifact - creature, hero or commander

___class.description: Artifact class, treasure, minor, major or relic

___bonuses.description: Bonuses provided by this artifact using bonus system

___value.description: Cost of this artifact, in gold

___components.description: Optional, list of components for combinational artifacts

___graphics.description: Graphical files associated with the artifact

___large.description: Large image, used for drag-and-drop and popup messages

___image.description: Base image for this artifact, used for example in hero screen
